# Advance Procurement Notice
## Commissioning Services - Garrison Petawawa, Ontario

### Overview

Defense Construction Canada (DCC) is issuing an advance procurement notice (APN) for commissioning services to support new building construction at Garrison Petawawa. This APN is not a solicitation for proposals, but rather a notice to provide interested bidders an opportunity to begin the security clearance application process.

### Objectives

- The objective is to identify a suitable consultant to provide commissioning services for new building construction projects at Garrison Petawawa.
- The selected consultant will be responsible for providing systematic verification, documentation, and training processes for all activities during design, construction, and static verification.
- The commissioning services will ensure that the facility operates in conformity with the owner's project requirements and the basis of design.

### Contract Award and Security Requirements

- To be eligible for contract award, the consultant must hold all required security clearance(s) at the time of closing.
- The required security clearance(s) are:
  - Facility Security Clearance (FSC) at the level of SECRET granted or approved by the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).
- DCC will provide sponsorship for consultants to obtain security clearance(s) through the Industrial Security Program (ISP).

### Procurement Method

- This APN is a competitive, open-bidding process.
- Interested consultants should begin the security clearance application process and submit their proposals when the solicitation is launched in winter 2025, pending approval.

### Important Considerations

- DCC does not guarantee that the proposed contract will proceed or that any security clearance(s) will be granted.
- The consultant must cooperate with the CSP, PWGSC in a timely fashion to further the security clearance application process.
- Consultants are warned that they assume the risks associated with the completeness or accuracy of their application or related documents.

## Contact Information

To inquire about this APN, please contact:

- Allanah O'Doherty, Team Leader, Contract Services
- Telephone: 343-422-4816
- Email: [allanah.o'doherty@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:allanah.o'doherty@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)

## Bidding and Documents

Bidding and documents are available on the Merx website (http://www.merx.com). Fees may apply. Please see the Merx website for pricing information.
